short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the CodeMirror based editor in SiteVision with a Monaco based one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the existing CodeMirror editor that is by default used within SiteVision with the new Monaco editor from Microsoft.
